name: LEGACY (LBFINALPROYECT)
description:
Install instructions

First download WinRAR: https://www.winrar.es/descargas

After you´ve installed WinRAR ( or if you already have it installed) click on the download button.

 Your download should appear on the bottom-left corner of your screen, as seen in the image below, wait for it to finish downloading, and click on it.

After doing that, a window should open, like the one seen below, drag the folder that says output into your desktop.

Open the Output folder.

Open the folder that says "LB Proyecto Final".

Click on "game.exe".

And done, now you can play the game!
